root.name: Dig & Spike Volleyball
root.description: OverviewThis game offers both indoor volleyball and beach volleyball. Players can compete solo against the computer or against another player in indoor volleyball. The same two options are available for beach volleyball in addition to competing with another player against the computer.The indoor volleyball side also features a training mode and a World Cup tournament mode while the beach volleyball side has a World Challenge mode.The game features eight playable teams for indoor volleyball:AlgeriaBrazilCubaCommonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union countries)ItalyJapanThe NetherlandsUnited StatesFor beach volleyball, there are eight teams named Spikers, Diggers, etc. that have different Power, Jump, and Speed ratings.

similar_games.game: Inazuma Serve Da!! Super Beach Volley
